title: To become an Amazon Clinic patient, first you sign away some privacy
description: You agreed to what? The ‘HIPAA authorization’ for Amazon's new low-cost Clinic offers the tech giant more control over your health data.

title: Key law enforcement computers still down 10 weeks after breach
description: A ransomware breach of a little-known computer network has shut down a key technical tool that the U.S. Marshals use to hunt fugitives via their cellphones.
